plot: Charlie takes pride in what he does best... watching women. Mandy, his latest prey, appears to be the perfect target. But coincidence, destiny, fate and luck all come together and result in Mandy being a woman Charlie will never forget.
title: Watch
plot_es: Charlie takes pride in what he does best... watching women. Mandy, his latest prey, appears to be the perfect target. But coincidence, destiny, fate and luck all come together and result in Mandy being a woman Charlie will never forget.
